item.title: Why does this blog exists
item.author: Pablo
item.description:
38% of webpages that existed in 2013 are no longer accessible a decade later 1.

  1. When Online Content Disappears (will be funny when you cannot access this citation) Pew Research Center, By Athena Chapekis, Samuel Bestvater, Emma Remy and Gonzalo Rivero. ↩︎

item.title: Basic Markdown Syntax
item.author: Dillon
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files.
